name: Room 7 - Escape Adventure
description:
You find yourself trapped in a mysterious room, warmed by the raging fire, you try to find a way out of Room 7.

Use your powers of deduction and logic to solve puzzles contained within Room 7.

Easy to play touch screen controls. Tap where you want to go - drag items to use them.

Haunting music score.

Great interactive visuals.

Easy to play on a commute to work or snuggled up on the sofa!

Can you escape Room 7?
